entry.name: Disney/ABC Project - OTV (Owned TV Stations) Video Page
entry.description:
One of my first major projects using AngularJS. ABC's Owned TV Stations needed a new video page to replace their old, outdated site.

Of note is how I was able to build components using AngularJS to streamline the development and prototyping process. I was able to produce new prototypes and front end designs at a rapid pace.

As of 2017, the project is still live on the 8 ABC Owned TV Stations.

entry.name: Dressmaker Demo
entry.description: A proof of concept I did for a prospective client. The idea was to allow a user to configure their dress according to a series options we presented them, and depending on the options, we present them with more options to build their custom dress.

entry.name: Sample Photo Gallery - Beaches and Scenery of Thailand
entry.description: A side project, a photo gallery templating system. For basic photo galleries, sites like Facebook, Instagram, and Flickr work great, but I wanted something where I could have more control on the display of the images. This one is more of a simple slideshow with animation and text.

entry.name: Magnify 360 Projects
entry.description: Magnify360.com is a company that does website optimization for large and medium sized companies. I've done work ranging from setting up a backend site to enable lead generation to front end development. Most of the work I've done there involve taking Photoshop mockups from various designers, slicing them up, andcreating HTML/Javascript/CSS code out of it that works across all browsers. I make every effort to make sure sites created are pixel perfect and designed to spec. You can take a look at some of my better efforts by clicking on the link.
